docs.snippet: The girl, now 12 years old, kept silent for months for fear that her stepsiblings would be put in foster care....
docs.lead_paragraph: The girl, now 12 years old, kept silent for months for fear that her stepsiblings would be put in foster care.
docs.abstract: Rajesh Ranot and Sheetal Ranot of Ozone Park, Queens, are charged with assault and child endangerment over abuse of his 12-year-old daughter; girl kept silent for months for fear that her stepsiblings would be put in foster care.

headline.main: Queens Couple Are Charged in Severe Abuse of Daughter
headline.print_headline: Queens Couple Are Charged in Severe Abuse of Daughter

docs.snippet: Student-athletes in the United States may move a step closer to receiving financial compensation, when a group of university leaders on Thursday are expected to allow the wealthiest collegiate sports programs to leave behind decades-old restrictio...
docs.lead_paragraph: Student-athletes in the United States may move a step closer to receiving financial compensation, when a group of university leaders on Thursday are expected to allow the wealthiest collegiate sports programs to leave behind decades-old restrictions and chart a self-governing course.

docs.snippet: Following Paul George's horrific injury, Mark Cuban commented that the I.O.C. played a trick in "convincing the world that the Olympics were about patriotism and pride instead of money." His stance misses the point....
docs.lead_paragraph: Following Paul George's horrific injury, Mark Cuban commented that the I.O.C. played a trick in "convincing the world that the Olympics were about patriotism and pride instead of money." His stance misses the point.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column argues that while Mark Cuban made several good points in his criticism of the NBA's participation in international competitions, he fails to understand its essential value; argues that the Olympics brought basketball to the world stage, vastly increasing the NBA's value, citing the 1992 'Dream Team'.

headline.seo: In Paul George Remarks, Mark Cuban Discounts Benefits of International Basketball
headline.main: Cuban Loses Sight of the Role of International Play
headline.print_headline: Cuban Loses Sight of the Role of International Play

docs.snippet: Minutes after a deadly earthquake shook western China, disaster teams were on the move. Within hours, food, tents, and even a 4G cellphone network were in place, showing how a fast-developing China can bring its plentiful experience and enormous r...
docs.lead_paragraph: Minutes after a deadly earthquake shook western China, disaster teams were on the move. Within hours, food, tents, and even a 4G cellphone network were in place, showing how a fast-developing China can bring its plentiful experience and enormous resources to bear in handling natural disasters.

headline.main: Volunteers Step Up in China's Response to Quake
headline.print_headline: Volunteers Step Up in China's Response to Quake
